item.description:
Are you getting everything you need from your food?

  • Learn why we must supplement to live healthier, longer and stronger lives.
  • Learn about our founder's 40 year mission to help people with a paradigm shift from treatment to prevention.
  • Hear testimonials from people losing 40-60 lbs or more, lowering their blood sugar levels without insulin, lowering their cholesteral without a prescription, increasing their energy for the longer work days many are facing or for a longer more fulfilled work out at the gym...
  • Learn how, instead of pouring money into the 70 plus Billion Dollar Health and Wellness Industry, you can help people and profit from it!
  • SAVE MONEY, GET HEALTHY, CREATE WEALTH!  

Tuesday 7:00 PM FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

RSVP, or contact Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.
item.name: Opportunity meeting - save money, get healthy and create wealth
